Said Christ, "I sanctify Myself that they also may be sanctified." This you need candidly to consider. What influence are you exerting in your home and in the business transactions in connection with His work and cause? I must tell you, your heart is not in the work. Your Christian life should sanctify the whole. It should pervade every branch of human action from the first to the 


                                     -289- 

last, from the highest to the lowest. "Whether . . . ye eat, or drink" (1 Corinthians 10:31), or "whatsoever ye do in word, or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus" (Colossians 3:17).
